description: Starting up is hard. Only 4% of all companies surpass the 1M$ in annual revenues. Scaling up is epic: only 0,4% of all companies achieve the 10M$ mark and under 0,04% the 100M$. How to face the growth challenges and how to keep your company culture strong? We will be answering these questions with the know-how of Accel Partners, Talkdesk, Elastron, Vieira Lopes and Artevasi on the WE’BIZ Talk “Scaling Company Culture” scheduled for the next May 10. The session is integrated on the Start & Scale Week agenda – week dedicated to the promotion of innovation, entrepreneurship and technology organised by ScaleUp Porto.
name: WE’BIZ Talk "Scaling Company Culture"
